name: HOUSE OF LLOYD, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: House of Lloyd, Inc. v. Commonwealth
docket_number: Direct Appeal No. 66 M.D. Appeal Docket 1997

parties: HOUSE OF LLOYD, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this third day of April, 1998, the order of the Commonwealth Court dated May 22,1997, is hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
708 A.2d 806
HOUSE OF LLOYD, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.
